products.title: Pale Pink (4565) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Pale Pink (4565) (Blackout) Velux Blackout Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Blackout Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.title: Pink Stars (4659)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Pink Stars (4659) Velux Childrens Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Childrens Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Our themed blinds will spark their imagination while they play during the day and because the fabric offers total blackout, they’ll enjoy restful sleep  too.



 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	
99.9% blackout from sun or moonlight.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.title: Sakura Pink Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Sakura Pink Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX80113. A floral patterned, dim-out pleated blind.
products.productdescription: Part of our Sakura patterned range, with a simple floral design which will bring warmth to any room. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Stirlo Hot Pink
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Stirlo Hot Pink Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Hot Pink Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Konya Blackout Hot Pink
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Hot Pink Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Hot Pink Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.
